about_the_game:
Space and Lazers: A Chaotic 4-Player Co-Op Adventure in Space!

Gather your friends and take command of a massive starship as you fight to deliver humanity’s last hope to a distant new home. In Space and Lazers, up to 4 players work together to manage ship systems, fend off enemies, and gather vital resources—but every second brings new challenges, and survival is anything but guaranteed.

Features:

  • 1-4 Player Local Co-op: Play solo or with up to 4 players locally! Use any combination of controllers and keyboard, including co-op for 2 players on a single keyboard.

  • Partial Online Co-op: Connect with friends remotely using Parsec and enjoy the chaos no matter where you are.

  • Ship System Management: Keep shields powered, extinguish fires, repair damage, and use the security lasers to fend off boarding aliens. The ship is your lifeline—don’t let it fall apart!

  • Emergent Gameplay: No two runs are the same. Fires break out, systems get hacked, and enemies like Hunters, Mutants, and Cultists bring unique dangers to your crew. Adapt and strategize on the fly to survive.

  • Top Gun-Inspired Fighter Pilots: Take control of the Daggers, your ship’s nimble fighters, to intercept missiles, blast incoming threats, and channel your inner ace pilot.

  • Unique Planet Challenges: Explore diverse planets, each with its own hazards—from deadly sandworms to colossal space fish. Quick thinking and teamwork are your only way through.

With its blend of fast-paced teamwork, system-driven chaos, and emergent storytelling, Space and Lazers delivers a thrilling co-op experience like no other. Humanity’s future depends on you—are you ready to take the helm?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
